verses.verse: Brethren, <S%G80><s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G2588>heart's<s%> <S%G2107>desire<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1162>prayer<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G2076>is,<s%> that they might be <S%G1519>saved.<s%> <S%G4991><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I bear them <S%G3140>record<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G2205>zeal<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G1922>knowledge.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> they being <S%G50>ignorant<s%> of <S%G2316>God's<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> going <S%G2212>about<s%> to <S%G2476>establish<s%> their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> have <S%G3756>not<s%> submitted <S%G5293>themselves<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is the <S%G5056>end<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> to every <S%G3956>one<s%> that <S%G4100>believeth.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1125>describeth<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G3754>That<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> which <S%G4160>doeth<s%> those <S%G846>things<s%> shall <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> which is <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3004>speaketh<s%> on this <S%G3779>wise,<s%> <S%G2036>Say<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4675>thine<s%> <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> shall <S%G305>ascend<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven?<s%> (that <S%G5123>is,<s%> to bring Christ <S%G2609>down<s%> <S%G5547><s%> from above: )

Or, <S%G2228><s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> shall <S%G2597>descend<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G12>deep?<s%> (that <S%G5123>is,<s%> to bring up Christ <S%G321>again<s%> <S%G5547><s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead.)<s%>

But <S%G235><s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> it? <S%G3588>The<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1451>nigh<s%> <S%G4675>thee,<s%> even <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4750>mouth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2588>heart:<s%> that <S%G5123>is,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G2784>preach;<s%>

That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> thou shalt <S%G3670>confess<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> shalt <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4675>thine<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> thou shalt be <S%G4982>saved.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> with the <S%G2588>heart<s%> man <S%G4100>believeth<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> with the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> confession is <S%G3670>made<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G4991>salvation.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> <S%G3004>saith,<s%> <S%G3956>Whosoever<s%> <S%G4100>believeth<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> shall <S%G3756>not<s%> be <S%G2617>ashamed.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> there <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1293>difference<s%> <S%G5037>between<s%> the <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1672>Greek:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> over <S%G3956>all<s%> is <S%G4147>rich<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that call <S%G1941>upon<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3956>whosoever<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall call <S%G1941>upon<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> shall be <S%G4982>saved.<s%>

How <S%G4459><s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> shall they call <S%G1941>on<s%> him <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> they have <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4100>believed?<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> shall they <S%G4100>believe<s%> in him of <S%G3739>whom<s%> they have <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G191>heard?<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> shall they <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> a <S%G2784>preacher?<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> shall they <S%G2784>preach,<s%> <S%G3362>except<s%> they be <S%G649>sent?<s%> as <S%G2531>it<s%> is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G5613>How<s%> <S%G5611>beautiful<s%> are <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%> of them that preach the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> of <S%G1515>peace,<s%> and bring glad <S%G2097>tidings<s%> of good <S%G18>things!<s%>

But <S%G235><s%> they have <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5219>obeyed<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2098>gospel.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> <S%G3004>saith,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> hath <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G189>report?<s%>
So <S%G686>then<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> cometh <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G189>hearing,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G189>hearing<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

But <S%G235><s%> I <S%G3004>say,<s%> Have they <S%G3378>not<s%> <S%G191>heard?<s%> Yes <S%G3304>verily,<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G5353>sound<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G4487>words<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4009>ends<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3625>world.<s%>

But <S%G235><s%> I <S%G3004>say,<s%> Did <S%G3378>not<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G1097>know?<s%> <S%G4413>First<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G3004>saith,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> will provoke you to <S%G3863>jealousy<s%> <S%G5209><s%> <S%G1909>by<s%> them that are <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1484>people,<s%> and <S%G1909>by<s%> a <S%G801>foolish<s%> <S%G1484>nation<s%> I will <S%G3949>anger<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> is very <S%G662>bold,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saith,<s%> I was <S%G2147>found<s%> of them that <S%G2212>sought<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%> <S%G3361>not;<s%> I was <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G1717>manifest<s%> unto them that asked not <S%G1905>after<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1691>me.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%> he <S%G3004>saith,<s%> <S%G3650>All<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> long I have stretched <S%G1600>forth<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> a <S%G544>disobedient<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G483>gainsaying<s%> <S%G2992>people.<s%>
